alert.note: Alert for Garden; Sheridan (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 20 at 4:56PM CDT until June 20 at 5:45PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: The National Weather Service in North Platte has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Garden County in the Panhandle of Nebraska... Southwestern Sheridan County in the Panhandle of Nebraska... * Until 445 PM MDT. * At 355 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 8 miles south of Alliance Airport, or 12 miles southeast of Alliance, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Ellsworth, Antioch, Snow Lake, Miles Lake, Wickson Lake, Patterson Lake, Lakeside, Herman Lake, Kennedy Lake, Wild Horse Flats and Tralnor Lake. This includes the following highways... Highway 250 between mile markers 1 and 12. Highway 2 between mile markers 96 and 128. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
